src:
Tingginya Tarif Endorse Georgina Rodriguez, Ikuti Jejak Cristiano Ronaldo
01 Nov 2019, 13:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Popularitas Cristiano Ronaldo tentunya berpengaruh pada karier sang pacar, Georgina Rodriguez. Georgina kabarnya juga dapat keuntungan finansial berkat hubungannya dengan bintang Juventus itu.
Model asal Argentina itu kerap mendapat tawaran mengiklankan produk ternama di akun Instagram personalnya. Menariknya, dalam sekali unggahan, Rodriguez mendapat ratusan juta rupiah.
Melansir Flash, Kamis (31/10/2019), wanita asal Argentina itu mendapat 5.000 dolar AS hingga 9.000 dolar atau sekitar Rp70 juta hingga Rp120 juta per unggahan di Instagram.
text:
High Endorse Rates Georgina Rodriguez, Follow in Cristiano Ronaldo's Footsteps
Nov 01 2019, 13:25 by Bola.net
The popularity of Cristiano Ronaldo certainly affects the career of his girlfriend, Georgina Rodriguez. Georgina reportedly also gained financial benefits thanks to her relationship with the Juventus star.
The Argentinian model often gets offers to advertise famous products on his personal Instagram account. Interestingly, in one upload, Rodriguez got hundreds of millions of rupiah.
Launch Flash, Thursday (10/31/2019), the woman from Argentina received 5,000 US dollars to 9,000 dollars or about Rp70 million to Rp120 million per upload on Instagram.
